description:
The Seventh an athletic pair of glasses with a rimless lower frame. Looks great riding, and at the after party. The rimless design provides excellent venting and an unobstructed view from odd angles (think drop bars).

  • Frame fits mid to large faces best
  • 9-base lens curve offers deep coverage
  • Adjustable, rubberized nose pads and temple tips
  • Treated with a military grade anti-fog material to keep you fog-free. Anti-fog lenses perform at their best when clean. Simply wash the lenses with water and they’ll keep your vision clear. When not in use, anti-fog lenses are happiest stored in a warm, dry environment
  • One colourway is embedded with military standard anti-fog material
name: Ryders Eyewear Seventh Sunglasses - Unisex

specs.key: Visible Light Transmission (Black White/Brown Lens An)
